oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dixie Chatter Christmas Edition newsletter, 1930 December 25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Newsletter published by The Dixie Mercerizing Company, Lupton City, Tennessee, for its employees. The issue includes employee updates, holiday features, and a list of Christmas goods for sale in the Lupton City community store.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cotton manufacture; Cotton textiles; Cotton textile industry; Employees' magazines, newsletters, etc.; Factories; Industrial sites
The Dixie Group
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Chattanooga Public Library; University of Tennessee at Chattanooga
